mapper.select: /*교육신청>교육목록팝업>교육차수정보(상세)*/ SELECT M.EDCT_ID AS EDCTID #교육ID ,M.EDCT_NM AS EDCTNM #교육명 ,M.EDIN_CD AS EDINCD #교육기관코드 ,(SELECT EDIN_NM FROM TB_IEP_CLI001C I WHERE I.EDIN_CD = M.EDIN_CD LIMIT 1) AS EDINNM #교육기관명 ,M.EDCT_CLSF_CD AS EDCTCLSFCD #교육분류코드 ,(SELECT EDCT_CLSF_NM FROM TB_IEP_CLD001C D WHERE D.EDCT_CLSF_CD = M.EDCT_CLSF_CD LIMIT 1) AS EDCTCLSFNM #교육뷴류명 ,M.SNCT_TGT_YN AS SNCTTGTYN#결재대상여부 ,M.EDCT_CON AS EDCTCON#교육내용 ,M.INBK_EDCT_YN AS INBKEDCTYN #행내교육여부 ,M.EGIN_APLY_YN AS EGINAPLYYN #고용보험적용여부 ,M.ONL_EDCT_YN AS ONLEDCTYN #온라인교육여부 ,M.EDCT_LEVL AS EDCTLEVL #교육수준 ,M.USE_YN AS USEYN #사용여부 ,C.EDCT_TRM AS edctTrm #교육기간 ,C.CTCR_TIM AS ctcrTim #이수시간 ,C.EDEX AS edex #교육비용 ,C.EDCT_STTG_YMD #학습시작시간 ,C.EDCT_FNSH_YMD #학습종료시간 FROM TB_IEP_EDM001M M, (SELECT EDCT_ID, EDCT_TRM, CTCR_TIM, EDEX, EDCT_STTG_YMD, EDCT_FNSH_YMD FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M WHERE EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId}) C WHERE M.EDCT_ID = C.EDCT_ID LIMIT 1

/*교육신청>교육목록팝업>교육차수정보(차수목록)*/ SELECT EDCT_CNT_ID AS EDCTCNTID #교육차수ID ,EDCT_STTG_YMD AS EDCTSTTGYMD #학습시작일 ,EDCT_FNSH_YMD AS EDCTFNSHYMD #학습종료일 ,APLC_STTG_YMD AS APLCSTTGYMD #신청시작일 ,APLC_FNSH_YMD AS APLCFNSHYMD #신청종료일 ,USE_YN AS USEYN #사용여부 ,RGSN_TS AS RGSNTS #등록일시 ,CASE WHEN NOW() BETWEEN APLC_STTG_YMD AND APLC_FNSH_YMD THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS aplcAbleYn FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M WHERE 1=1 AND EDCT_ID = (SELECT DISTINCT EDCT_ID FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M WHERE EDCT_CNT_ID = #{edctCntId} ) ORDER BY APLC_STTG_YMD DESC

/*교육신청>교육목록팝업>결재요청>결재가능여부 확인*/ SELECT CASE WHEN APLC_STG_CD='APRRJT' THEN 'update' WHEN APLC_STG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 'disable' ELSE 'insert' END AS MODCODE FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M WHERE USER_ID = '41007' AND EDCT_CNT_ID = '27' AND USE_YN ='Y' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: /*교육신청>교육목록팝업>교육신청등록(결재)*/ INSERT INTO TB_IEP_CLS001C( EDCT_CNT_ID #교육차수ID ,TEAM_CD #팀코드 ,DVCD #부서코드 ,USER_ID #신청자ID ,APLC_TS #신청일시 ,APND_DAT #첨부파일 ,DPT_ATHZ_ID #부서승인ID ,DPT_ATHZ_TS #부서승인일시 ,MNGR_ATHZ_ID #관리자승인ID ,MNGR_ATHZ_TS #관리자승인일시 ,APL_CSTG_CD #교육신청단계코드 ,CTCR_YN #수료여부 ,RFRC_CON #참고 ,RTRE_CON #반려사유 ,USE_YN #사용여부 ) VALUES( ,#{edctCntId} ,#{teamCd} ,#{dvcd} ,#{userId} ,NOW() ,#{apndDat} ,#{dptAthzId} ,NULL ,(SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M ATHR_CD='GRM') ,NULL ,'APRDPM' ,'N' ,NULL ,NULL ,'Y' )
mapper.update: /*교육신청>교육목록팝업>교육신청재등록*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_EDA001M SET APLC_TS = NOW() #신청일시 ,APND_DAT = #{apndDat} #첨부파일 ,DPM_ATHZ_ID = #{dpmAthzId} #부서담당자ID ,DPM_ATHZ_TS = NULL #부서담당자승인일시 ,GRM_ATHZ_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M ATHR_CD='GRM' LIMIT 1) #그룹담당자ID ,GRM_ATHZ_TS = NULL #그룹담당자승인일시 ,APLC_STG_CD = 'APRDEP' #교육신청단계코드 WHERE EDCT_APLC_ID = #{edctAplcId}
mapper.select: /*게시판>공지사항>공지사항조회*/ SELECT PBNS_ID AS PBNSID #공지사항ID ,EDCT_CLSF_CD AS EDCTCLSFCD #교육분류코드 ,(SELECT EDCT_CLSF_NM FROM TB_IEP_CLD001C D WHERE D.EDCT_CLSF_CD = N.EDCT_CLSF_CD LIMIT 1 ) AS EDCTCLSFNM #교육기관명 ,TTL AS TTL #제목 ,CON AS CON #내용 ,RGSN_TS AS RGSNTS #등록일시 ,USER_ID AS USERID #사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M U WHERE U.USER_ID = N.USER_ID LIMIT 1 ) AS USERNM #신청자명 ,APND_DAT AS APNDDAT #첨부파일 ,USE_YN AS USEYN #사용여부 FROM TB_IEP_BDN001M N WHERE 1=1 AND PBNS_ID = #{pbnsId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /*게시판>공지사항>공지사항 수정*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_BDN001M set TTL = #{ttl} #제목 ,CON = #{con}#내용 ,APND_DAT = #{apndDat} #첨부파일 WHERE PBNS_ID =#{pbnsId}
/*게시판>자료실>자료실 수정*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_BDR001M set EDCT_CLSF_CD = #{edctClsfCd} #교육분류코드 ,TTL = #{ttl} #제목 ,CON = #{con}#내용 ,APND_DAT = #{apndDat} #첨부파일 WHERE RFLB_ID = #{rflbId}
mapper.select: /*관리자>교육신청현황>교육상세팝업*/ SELECT M.EDCT_NM AS EDCTNM#교육명 ,M.EDCT_CON AS EDCTCON #교육내용 ,C.EDCT_STTG_TIM AS EDCTSTTGTIM #교육시작시간 ,C.EDCT_FNSH_TIM AS EDCTFNSHTIM #교육종료시간 FROM TB_IEP_EDC001M C #교육차수 ,TB_IEP_EDM001M M #교육메인 WHERE 1=1 AND C.EDCT_ID = M.EDCT_ID AND M.EDCT_NM = #{edctNm}

/*관리자>교육신청현황>교육상세팝업(차수)*/ SELECT EDCT_APLC_ID AS EDCTAPLCID #교육신청ID ,TEAM_CD AS TEAMCD #팀코드 ,DVCD AS DVCD #부서코드 ,(SELECT BRNM FROM TB_IEP_CMB001M C WHERE C.BRCD = A.TEAM_CD) AS BRNM #팀명 ,(SELECT BRNM FROM TB_IEP_CMB001M C WHERE C.BRCD = A.DVCD) AS BRNM #부서명 ,USER_ID AS USERID #신청자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M U WHERE U.USER_ID = A.USER_ID) AS USERNM#신청자명 FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M A WHERE 1=1 AND EDCT_CNT_ID =#{edctCntId} #교육차수ID
